alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:23PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Twin Falls and east central Owyhee Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clover Creek Crossing, or 32 miles south of Glenns Ferry, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Horse Butte around 330 PM MDT. Crows Nest Butte around 340 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
